name: Alice C. VON DER HEIDE, as Executrix of the Estate of William Von Der Heide, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner

parties: Alice C. VON DER HEIDE, as Executrix of the Estate of William Von Der Heide, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 11th day of August, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, but LIMITED to the following issue:
Does the Commonwealth Court’s Opinion conflict with decisions that a trial court’s ruling on a motion for a new trial must be sustained absent a clear abuse of discretion or error of law?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
699 A.2d 717
Alice C. VON DER HEIDE, as Executrix of the Estate of William Von Der Heide, Deceased, Respondent v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.
No. 0743 M.D. Allocatur Docket 1996.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 11, 1997.
